metadata.title: CVE-2024-20696 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
Windows libarchive Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-20696` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libarchive-tools - 3.7.2-2ubuntu0.3
libarchive13t64 - 3.7.2-2ubuntu0.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libarchive package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.7.2-2ubuntu0.3').
